desc.name: Mentor learners on their online engagement platforms.
I am helping to ensure focused efforts on the efficiency and effective communication flow from the program managers to the facilitators, mentors and  learners.
Making recommendations for improving the organisation website.
Assisting co-workers with everyday IT needs.
Performed maintenance and updates to existing client Web sites.
Participated in brainstorming sessions to come up with ideas.
Worked on multiple projects simultaneously to a high standard.
Developing and maintaining the front-end functionality of websites.
Devising SEO strategies based on specific keywords.
